price: Ellos [los demonios] apartan del camino, pero [los incrédulos] creen que están bien encaminados.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُمۡ لَيَصُدُّونَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahum layaṣuddūnahum ʿani al-sabīli wayaḥsabūna annahum muh'tadūna
